#define T(u) texture(iChannel0,(u)/iResolution.xy)
#define T1(u) texture(iChannel1,(u)/iResolution.xy)

#define R (iResolution.xy)

#define pal(a,b,c,d,e) ((a) + (b)*sin((c)*(d) + (e)))
